name: pdf-document-feeder
description: Sorting PDF pages after scanning through a document feeder

scripts.test: npm run test:even && npm run test:odd
scripts.test:even: npm start test-even-input.pdf test-even-output.pdf && diff-pdf-visually test-even-output.pdf test-even-expected.pdf && rm test-even-output.pdf
scripts.test:odd: npm start test-odd-input.pdf test-odd-output.pdf && diff-pdf-visually test-odd-output.pdf test-odd-expected.pdf && rm test-odd-output.pdf

author: compose.us GmbH <hello@compose.us> (https://compose.us)
